first_translate: I heard you received a marriage proposal from his highness!
congratulations! I’m so happy for you!
his highness has been talking about this nonstop...

hangle: 리비아 영애를 얼마나 깊게 맘에 두셨으면~
first_translate: it’s clear how much he adores lady livia...!
oh, yes.
thank you very much.

hangle: 아직 답을 주지 않았는데도 제멋대로 떠들고 다녀?
first_translate: but why is everyone making such a big deal out of this when I haven’t even given him my answer yet?
this really gets on my nerves...
lady livia, are you alright?
no, not at all...
that makes sense...
fiona.

hangle: 상대를 나락에 빠뜨리려면 어떻게 해야 할까요?
first_translate: do you know what would make someone fall into ruin?
w-who do you mean by “someone”?
doesn’t that go without saying?
she surprised me.
I thought she was going to ask me if there were any ways to torment eunice like in the original story.
but since we’re dealing with the crown prince instead of eunice,
th-there actually is one way...
a method to bring down the crown prince.
the illegal arena incident.
in the novel, sigren and eunice solve this case together.

hangle: 원래대로라면 두 사람이 조사 끝에 투기장을 발견하게 되고,
first_translate: normally, they discover the location of the arena after conducting their own investigation,

hangle: 사건을 호쾌하게 해결해서 명성을 높여야 한다.
first_translate: and then gain fame as heroes once they resolve the issue.

hangle: 하지만 급한 건 황태자를 제지하는 일이니
first_translate: but stopping the crown prince comes first right now,
so I’ll have to skip those steps and take matters into my own hands.

hangle: 마물을 생포를 의뢰한 사람들은 투기장의 운영자였을 거야.
first_translate: the people who requested us to capture monsters must’ve been the ones running the arena.

hangle: 마물끼리 싸움을 붙이고 돈내기를 한단 말이야?
first_translate: they made money off monster fights?
exactly. kind of like horse racing.
what idiots.

hangle: 그 운영자들이 언제까지 마물을 잘 관리할 수 있을지도 의문이군.
first_translate: I wonder how long they can keep these beasts under control before things get out of hand.
I agree completely.
we need to shut them down quickly.
by the way, fiona...

hangle: 불법 투기장에 관한 건 어떻게 안 거야?
first_translate: how did you find out about the illegal arena?
well...
gah!
your face is too close.

hangle: 우리 둘이 정보를 수집하는 경로는 꽤 겹친다고 생각하는데.
first_translate: I think our sources overlap quite often.
wait, are you suspecting something?
of course not.
why would I ever doubt you?
sometimes...

hangle: 넌 다른 사람보다 훨씬 더 많은 걸 파악할 때가 있으니까.
first_translate: you seem to understand more than others.
r-right.
maybe call it intuition or foresight.
right.

hangle: 아벨도 네 그런 점을 높게 평가했으니까.
first_translate: even abel praised your ability to see through situations.
then maybe I acted suspiciously.
I better watch myself from now on.
to me, everything seems obvious because I already read the book,

hangle: 다른 사람이 보기엔 그렇지 않을 수 있으니까.
first_translate: but other people might view it differently.
stop worrying over nothing.
just like how you told me you’d always stand by my side,
I will also support you no matter what happens.
so don’t worry.
now tell me what you wanted to say.

hangle: 뭔가 하고 싶은 말이 있어서 서두가 길었던 거 아냐?
first_translate: isn’t that why you dragged on for so long just now?
o-oh...
uh-huh.

hangle: 실은 불법 투기장을 운영하는 자들을 잡음과 동시에
first_translate: while catching the people operating the illegal arena,
I want to destroy the crown prince's reputation as well.

hangle: 아직 발그레한 얼굴로 잘도 저런 말을…
first_translate: look at her blushing while speaking of such evil deeds...
first,

hangle: 황태자가 불법 투기장에 출입하게 할 거야.
first_translate: I plan to lure the crown prince into visiting the arena himself.
can you pull that off?
well, only time will tell.
still, I have some powerful allies on my side.
allies?
haha,
I'm confident enough.
greetings, little sun of the empire.

hangle: 인사는 됐어. 날이 좋으니 테라스로 와라.
first_translate: enough chit-chat. come outside onto the balcony. it’s nice today.
alright.
you've become pretty obedient lately.
I guess you were trying to act stubborn until now.
your highness,
have you heard the rumors?
which rumors?

hangle: 글쎄, 수도 한가운데에 마물을 볼 수 있는 곳이 있다더군요.
first_translate: apparently, there’s somewhere in the capital where you can see real-life demons.

hangle: 마물 같은걸 볼 수 있게 해 놓은 곳이 있다고?
first_translate: an arena featuring demon fights?
really?

hangle: 그런 걸 보러 가는 놈들이 있단 말인가.
first_translate: are there fools dumb enough to visit such places?
my goodness.
not anyone can enter,

hangle: 선택받은 사람만 볼 수 있는 광경이라는 걸요?
first_translate: only chosen individuals may witness such sights.
come on,
take the bait.
chosen individuals...?
ha! isn’t that entertainment tailored specifically for me?!
hmm, but where exactly is it located?
finally took the hook.
fool.

hangle: 글쎄요, 아이작 백작님이나 오헬 자작님이 아신다고만….
first_translate: I’m not entirely sure, but count isaac and viscount o’hell seemed to know its whereabouts...

hangle: 아시다시피, 저에게 그런 것에 대해 자세히 말해 주는 분들은 별로 없으니까요.
first_translate: as you know, few people share details regarding such topics with me.
true.

hangle: 너 같은 사교계의 꽃은 귀하게 다뤄야 하니까.
first_translate: after all, flowers of high society deserve special treatment.
can I hit him just once?
um,

hangle: 그 두 분도 황태자 전하께서 물어보시면 당연히 대답을 해주시겠죠?
first_translate: if you asked them yourselves, wouldn’t they gladly give you answers?
you’re absolutely right, livia.
your highness,

hangle: 나중에 꼭 보고 오셔서, 제게 감상을 말씀해 주셔야 해요?
first_translate: make sure to return later and tell me all about it, okay?
I’m dying to hear every detail.
okay... of course...
I’m sorry, sigren.
I shouldn’t have called you here knowing how busy you are.
don’t mention it.

hangle: 널 투기장에 혼자 보낼 순 없으니까.
first_translate: I couldn’t let you go alone to the arena anyway.
also...

hangle: 최대한 눈에 띄지 말아야 한다고 했던 거 기억하지?
first_translate: do you remember telling me to avoid drawing attention to ourselves?
of course.

hangle: 아무래도 은발은 너무 눈에 띌 것 같으니
first_translate: I figured silver hair would stick out too much,
so I dyed mine according to your suggestion last time.
what do you think?
does it look weird?
